Contact Us

The City of Watauga Report a Concern Center is a resource for submitting non-emergency service requests to the City.  If you live, work or are visiting Watauga and you have a request for the City to make a repair or address an issue, you can use the Center to notify us.  You can also use the Center to report Code violations.

The City of Watauga strives to respond to concerns within 2-business days.

Department Phone Number / Email Areas of Responsibility
